author: ryanleeschneider
content:
btw etherscan's disassembler seems to fail decompiling this (https://etherscan.io/bytecode-decompiler?a=0x000f3df6d732807ef1319fb7b8bb8522d0beac02 ) , also it looks like  `cast` hasn't been updated w/ `push0` opcode added in Shanghai (https://gist.github.com/ryanschneider/241f2f63992a463c11ba8f4c8dba2dd0. `5f` opcodes come back as `INVALID`) .  I decoded a bit by hand and everything seems ok but just wanted to mention it.

edit: looks like `cast` just added `push0` a couple days ago, so that works but etherscan still fails.
